alert.note: Alert for Eastland; Palo Pinto; Stephens (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 21 at 8:19PM CST until February 21 at 9:15PM CST by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Eastland County in north central Texas... Southern Stephens County in north central Texas... Southwestern Palo Pinto County in north central Texas... * Until 915 PM CST. * At 818 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Atwell, or 13 miles southwest of Cisco, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is possible. * Locations impacted include... Eastland, Cisco, Ranger, Necessity, Gunsight and Strawn. This includes Interstate 20 between mile markers 324 and 363. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
